RT @TFMRIRE: 1. The constitution is in fact a legal documentat and does have an impact (and governs) Irish legislation. It is not a "set of…
RT @TFMRIRE: 3. A hospital who failed to induce a pregnancy where an FFA has been diagnosed is not "mistaken". They are unable to under the…
RT @TFMRIRE: 4. The 8th Amendment is the reason the law cannot be changed. Without a referendum and a decision by the Irish people to #repe…

@YourRepealers @SiobhanDonohue @TFMRIRE Thank you for sharing ,I can relate so much - I am same age as you and I was pregnant with our 3rd child in 2011,at our 12 week scan a problem was flagged,thankfully after having a cvs test - all was ok but I could easily have needed to terminate for medical reasons #repealth8th
